/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the right side of the road, looking towards the left. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner. The highway itself is divided by a median, and there are trees lining both sides, adding a touch of green to the scene. On the right side of the road, there's a yellow sign with black text, although the content of the text isn't discernible from the image. The overall scene suggests a sunny day in a bustling city.
